did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Methodist Episcopal Church of East Bloomfield records, 1860-1911.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Methodist Episcopal Church of East Bloomfield (East Bloomfield, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Trustee meeting minutes, two membership registers, and annual meeting minutes of the Sunday school board.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Trustee meeting minutes (1861-1900), two membership registers (1866-1884, 1864-1913), and annual meeting minutes of the Sunday school board (1871-1884).
